mapper.select: select ta.id,ta.name from t_area ta where ta.parent is null
select ta.id,ta.name from t_area ta where ta.parent = #{value}

select ta.*,tar.name provinceName,tara.name areaName,tare.name cityName from t_address ta left join t_area tar on ta.province = tar.id left join t_area tare on ta.city = tare.id left join t_area tara on ta.area = tara.id where ta.userId = #{value}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_order(order_id, payment,post_fee, status, create_time, update_time, user_id,buyer_nick, buyer_rate) values(#{orderId},#{payment},0,#{status},#{createTime}, #{updateTime},#{userId},#{buyerNick},1)

insert into tb_order_item(item_id, order_id,num, title, price, total_fee, pic_path)values
(#{item.itemId},#{item.orderId},#{item.num},#{item.title},#{item.price},#{item.totalFee},#{item.picPath})
